item.description:
Welcome to the first "Abundance and Empowerment" Meetup!

From 7:00 to 8:00, we'll meet, mingle, order food and drinks and introduce ourselves. This is a good time to consider sharing the name of a book, CD or movie that sparked our interest in using positive, nurturing thought patterns to improve our lives.

We may use these as topics for future meetings.

From 8:00 to 9:00 we'll look at "Ordering From The Cosmic Kitchen - The Essential Guide to Powerful, Nourishing Affirmations" by Patricia J. Crane, Ph.D.

She says "This book is dedicated to all those who are seeking to make positive changes in their own lives and to help our planet."

Mark Victor Hansen, Co-Creator of #1 New York Times best-selling series Chicken Soup For the Soul(R) says "If you're ready to lovingly nurture yourself with positive affirmations, here's the book for you."

Alan Cohen, best-selling author of "The Dragon Doesn't Live Here Anymore" says "Here is a clear practical, wisdom-filled guide to bringing your life into harmony with your heart's desires. Put these principles into practice, and you are sure to find what you are looking for. These affirmations really work."
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess for "The Abundance Meetup"

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: A look at "Ordering From The Cosmic Kitchen" by Patricia J. Crane, Ph.D.
